lead_paragraph: People crowded the streets in San Salvador for a ceremony to beatify Archbishop Óscar Romero, who was assassinated in 1980 as the country lurched toward civil war.

headline.print_headline: Salvadorans Flock to Beatification of Much-Loved Archbishop
headline.main: Salvadorans Flock to Honor Beloved Archbishop on Path to Sainthood

snippet: People crowded the streets in San Salvador for a ceremony to beatify Archbishop Óscar Romero, who was assassinated in 1980 as the country lurched toward civil war.
abstract: Tens of thousands of people take to streets in San Salvador to celebrate beatification of Archbishop Oscar Romero, who was assassinated in 1980.
